pageContent: LOGINLOGOUTHELPPrinter FriendlyPageEarthfiles, news category.Share:DiggFacebookStumbleUponMore Crop Formations in England© 2001 by Linda Moulton Howe May 31, 2001 Southern England - Since May 12 when a farmer nearWarnford, Hampshire found a flattened circle surrounded by rings in his yellowflowering oilseed rape, there have been four more reported in the counties ofDorset, Wiltshire and Hertfordshire.May 2001May 12, 2001 - Double ringed circle, 100 feet diameter, oilseed rape,at Old Winchester Hill near Warnford, Hampshire.Aerial photograph © 2001 by David Russell.May 19, 2001 - Sevenfold pattern inside circle, 152 feet diameter, oilseed rape,at the end of the Bournemouth International Airport in Hurn near Christchurch,Dorset.

Aerial photographs © 2001 by Steve Alexander,http://www.temporarytemples.co.ukMay 25, 2001 - Simple circle, perhaps 8 feet diameter, with double grapeshotnear perimeter, oilseed rape, close to the slopes of the Pewsey White Horse inWiltshire.Aerial Photograph © 2001 by Peter Sorensen.May 27, 2001 - Complex triangle pattern inside circle, appx. 150 feet diameter,barley, Berranburgh field below RAF hospital near Burderop, Hackpen andBarbury Castle, Wiltshire.Aerial photograph © 2001 by Peter R. Sorensen.May 28, 2001 - "Scarab beetle with sun" motif, Pegsdon about 3 miles west ofHitchin, Hertfordshire.
